Room.Name: Avatar Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Avatar Boulevard, just west of the Ruins entrance.
Room.LongDescription: A large building opens up into the wonderous Avatar Ruins, a virtually desolate place where the world has more or less just opened up. Various pieces of rock and debris lie scattered about. The Ruins are said to hold a number of secrets about the past and the future, but no one has really ever been able to figure them out.
